item.title: Readings shared October 15, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 15 October 2024 are

  • Readings shared October 13, 2024. #AI #CategoryTheory #Coq #Education #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell #ITP #ITP
  • On using GeoGebra and ChatGPT for geometric discovery. ~ Francisco Botana, Tomás Recio, María Pilar Vélez. #GeoGebra #ChatGPT #Math #AI
  • Lean: First steps (12 - Odd & Even ). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social) #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Tutorial videos for the course "Lean: First Steps". ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • The handshaking lemma. ~ Christoph Spiegel. #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4 #Math
  • Water sort in Haskell. ~ Nicolas Audinet de Pieuchon. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • The power of Prolog. ~ Markus Triska (@MarkusTriska). #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Programación lógica con restricciones. #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Emacs para ciencias del dato. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • The λ-calculus, 2: The Church-Rosser theorem. ~ Lawrence Paulson (@LawrPaulson@mathstodon.xyz). #LambdaCalculus
